location: Near Shandao Temple MRT (善導寺站), Huashan area, Zhongzheng District
notes: Well-equipped 1BR apartment in elevator building with good amenities including AC, washer, fridge. Located conveniently near MRT (349m) with many schools nearby. No photos available to assess baby safety features like balcony railings or condition, but balcony is mentioned. High management fee (NT$4,671/mo) suggests maintained building. No pets allowed.
